name: The Circuit
description:
THE CIRCUIT

Bytes are the currency and power within the virtual world. The more bytes you have, the better off you are. The only way to get bytes is to scavenge them from “The Circuit”. However, the Circuit is full of dangers, such as Firewalls and Viruses. Help Cache, on his trusted motorbike RAM, collect bytes along the road. The more bytes you have the better.

This game has been designed with the intention of a 90s Arcade game theme and uses both joystick and keyboard control.

Bitbucket Repository link: https://bitbucket.org/BadRabbit97/the_circuit/src/master/
